連.definition: to link; to join; to connect; continuously; in succession; including; (used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even; company (military)

連三併四.definition: one after the other; in succession (idiom)

連中三元.definition: (old) to rank first in the imperial examinations at the provincial capital, the national capital and the palace successively; (sports etc) to achieve three successes in a row (three matches in a row, three goals in a match etc)

連串.definition: one after the other; a succession of; a series of

連任.definition: to continue in (a political) office; to serve for another term of office

連動.definition: to link; to peg (currency); gang (gears); continuously; serial verb construction

連南瑤族自治縣.pinyin: Lian2 nan2 Yao2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4
連南瑤族自治縣.definition: Liannan Yao Autonomous County in Qingyuan 清遠|清远[Qing1 yuan3], Guangdong

連南縣.definition: Liannan Yaozu autonomous county in Qingyuan 清遠|清远[Qing1 yuan3], Guangdong

連合.definition: to combine; to join; to unite; alliance; same as 聯合|联合

連哄帶騙.definition: to cajole; to sweet talk sb into doing sth

連坐.definition: to treat as guilty those associated with an offender (family, neighbors etc)

連城.definition: Liancheng, county-level city in Longyan 龍岩|龙岩, Fujian

連城縣.definition: Liancheng county in Longyan 龍岩|龙岩, Fujian

連夜.definition: that very night; through the night; for several nights in a row

連天.definition: reaching the sky; for days on end; incessantly

連奔帶跑.definition: to run quickly; to rush; to gallop

連宵.definition: the same night; that very night; successive nights

連寫.definition: to write without lifting one's pen from the paper; (in the Romanization of Chinese) to write two or more syllables together as a single word (not separated by spaces)

連山.definition: Lianshan district of Huludao city 葫蘆島市|葫芦岛市, Liaoning

連山區.definition: Lianshan district of Huludao city 葫蘆島市|葫芦岛市, Liaoning

連山壯族瑤族自治縣.pinyin: Lian2 shan1 Zhuang4 zu2 Yao2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4
連山壯族瑤族自治縣.definition: Lianshan Zhuang and Yao autonomous county in Qingyuan 清遠|清远[Qing1 yuan3], Guangdong

連山縣.definition: Lianshan Zhuang and Yao autonomous county in Qingyuan 清遠|清远[Qing1 yuan3], Guangdong

連州.definition: see 連州市|连州市[Lian2zhou1 Shi4]

連州市.definition: Lianzhou, county-level city in Qingyuan 清遠市|清远市[Qing1yuan3 Shi4], Guangdong

連巹.definition: to share nuptial cup; (fig.) to get married

連帶.definition: to be related; to entail; to involve; joint (liability etc)

連帶責任.definition: to bear joint responsibility for sth; joint liability (law)

連平.definition: Lianping county in Heyuan 河源[He2 yuan2], Guangdong

連平縣.definition: Lianping county in Heyuan 河源[He2 yuan2], Guangdong

連戰.definition: Lien Chan (1936-), Taiwanese politician, former vice-president and chairman of Guomintang

連戰連勝.definition: fighting and winning a series of battles (idiom); ever victorious

連招.definition: (gaming or martial arts) a sequence of attacks or moves; combo

連接.definition: to link; to join; to connect

連擊.definition: to batter; combo (hit) (gaming); (volleyball, table tennis etc) double hit; double contact

連敗.definition: consecutive defeats; to lose several times in a row

連日.definition: day after day; for several days running

連書.definition: to write without lifting one's pen from the paper; (in the Romanization of Chinese) to write two or more syllables together as a single word (not separated by spaces)

連本帶利.definition: both principal and interest; capital plus profit

連根拔.definition: to pull up by the roots; to uproot

連橫.definition: Horizontal Alliance, clique of the School of Diplomacy 縱橫家|纵横家[Zong4 heng2 jia1] during the Warring States Period (425-221 BC)

連江.definition: Lianjiang, a county in Fuzhou City 福州市[Fu2zhou1 Shi4], Fujian; Lienchiang County, the official name of the Matsu Islands 馬祖列島|马祖列岛[Ma3zu3 Lie4dao3], a county of the ROC (based in Taiwan)

連江縣.definition: Lianjiang, a county in Fuzhou City 福州市[Fu2zhou1 Shi4], Fujian; Lienchiang County, the official name of the Matsu Islands 馬祖列島|马祖列岛[Ma3zu3 Lie4dao3], a county of the ROC (based in Taiwan)

連滾帶爬.definition: (idiom) stumbling and crawling; scrambling; frantically trying to escape

連片.definition: forming a continuous sheet; continuous; contiguous; closely grouped

連珠.definition: joined as a string of pearls; in rapid succession; alignment; Renju, a Japanese game, also called Gomoku or five-in-a-row

連珠砲.definition: barrage of gunfire (often used as a metaphor for rapid speech)

連理.definition: two trees that grow together as one; fig. conjugal union

連璧.definition: to join jade annuli; fig. to combine two good things

連用.definition: to use (two words etc) together; to use (sth) continuously

連發.definition: to fire (a weapon) in rapid succession

連筆.definition: to write without lifting one's pen from the paper

連篇累牘.definition: (of a piece of writing) long and tedious (idiom); verbose

連累.definition: to implicate; to get (sb) into trouble; also pr. [lian2lei3] or [lian2lei4]

連結.definition: variant of 聯結|联结[lian2 jie2]

連絡.definition: variant of 聯絡|联络[lian2 luo4]

連綴.definition: to put together; linking; successive; a cluster

連綿.definition: continuous; unbroken; uninterrupted; extending forever into the distance (of mountain range, river etc)

連綿詞.definition: variant of 聯綿詞|联绵词[lian2 mian2 ci2]

連線.definition: electrical lead; connecting line; (Tw) to connect (to a network, device etc); to go online; connection; (congressional) caucus

連續.definition: continuous; in a row; serial; consecutive

連續介質力學.pinyin: lian2 xu4 jie4 zhi4 li4 xue2
連續介質力學.definition: mechanics of a continuous medium; fluid mechanics

連續劇.definition: serialized drama; dramatic series; show in parts

連翩.definition: variant of 聯翩|联翩[lian2 pian1]

連號.definition: consecutive serial numbers; chain (of supermarkets, hotels etc); hyphen

連袂.definition: variant of 聯袂|联袂[lian2 mei4]

連襟.definition: husbands of sisters; brothers-in-law; extremely close (of a relationship)

連貫.definition: to link up (disparate elements); coherent (narrative, argument etc)

連軸轉.definition: (coll.) to work non-stop; to work around the clock

連載.definition: serialized; published as a serial (in a newspaper)

連通.definition: to connect; to communicate; to relate; (math.) connected

連連看.definition: pattern matching (puzzle game); matching (type of test question in which presented items are to be paired up)

連鍋端.definition: to take even the cooking pots (idiom); to clean out; to wipe out

連鎖.definition: to interlock; to be linked; chain (store etc)

連鑣並軫.definition: lit. reins together and carriages level (idiom); keeping exactly abreast of one another; running neck and neck

連雲.definition: Lianyun district of Lianyungang city 連雲港市|连云港市[Lian2 yun2 gang3 shi4], Jiangsu

連雲區.definition: Lianyun district of Lianyungang city 連雲港市|连云港市[Lian2 yun2 gang3 shi4], Jiangsu

連雲港.definition: see 連雲港市|连云港市[Lian2yun2gang3 Shi4]

連雲港市.definition: Lianyungang, prefecture-level city in Jiangsu Province 江蘇省|江苏省[Jiang1su1 Sheng3]

連麥.definition: (of two people in different locations) to sing or otherwise perform together using communications technology
